title: Counting triangles
text:
Consider a 2D integer grid with lower left corner at (0, 0) and upper right corner at (X, Y). We are interested in isosceles right triangles which all the 3 corners at the grid node (integer coordinates). Your task is to count the number of those triangles.InputThe input begins with C – number of test cases.Each test case consists of X, Y.OutputFor each test case, output the result in a line.ConstraintsC ≤ 200 ≤ X, Y ≤ 1000ExampleInput:2
0 3
1 1Output:0
4
